member.name: T:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateProductDto
member.summary: Data transfer object used to create a new product.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateProductDto.Name
member.summary: Name of the product.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateProductDto.UnitPrice
member.summary: Unit price of the product.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateProductDto.StockQuantity
member.summary: Initial stock quantity of the product.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateProductDto.SupplierId
member.summary: Identifier of the supplier associated with the product.

member.name: T:SmartStock.Dtos.OrderFiltersDto
member.summary: Filtering options for listing orders.

member.name: T:SmartStock.Dtos.OrderItemFiltersDto
member.summary: Filtering options for listing order items.

member.name: T:SmartStock.Dtos.PaginationDto
member.summary: Base pagination parameters used for listing resources.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.PaginationDto.Page
member.summary: Page number (1-based). Defaults to 1.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.PaginationDto.PageSize
member.summary: Page size (items per page). Defaults to 20.

member.name: T:SmartStock.Dtos.ProductFiltersDto
member.summary: Filtering options for listing products.

member.name: T:SmartStock.Dtos.StockMovementFiltersDto
member.summary: Filtering options for listing stock movements.

member.name: T:SmartStock.Dtos.SupplierFiltersDto
member.summary: Filtering options for listing suppliers.

member.name: T:SmartStock.Dtos.UpdateProductDto
member.summary: Data transfer object used to partially update an existing product. All properties are optional; only provided values will be updated.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.UpdateProductDto.Name
member.summary: New name for the product (optional).

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.UpdateProductDto.UnitPrice
member.summary: New unit price for the product (optional).

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.UpdateProductDto.SupplierId
member.summary: New supplier identifier for the product (optional).

member.summary: Generic API response envelope that wraps a message and a typed payload.
